email_server.gmail_username: to be set before start eg yourownemail@gmail.com, required
email_server.gmail_password: to be set before start, required
email_server.forward_alias: to be set before start eg yourownemail@customer-support.com, optional

failure_settings.alert_alias: to be set before start, required
failure_settings.alert_subject: FB Messenger Bot's failed somewhere, oops!
